title: The Dangers of Digital Discourse
author: Kevin DeYoung
dc:creator: Kevin DeYoung
description: In an age where digital immediacy can be confused for personal intimacy, we often forget that public communication will not have all the features of private communication.
content:encoded: In an age where digital immediacy can be confused for personal intimacy, we often forget that public communication will not have all the features of private communication.
